languages.text: {n}Высокий друкари, чье тело испещрено болезненного вида проколами и усеяно металлическими кольцами и зажимами, издает смешок при вашем приближении и заговаривает на своем языке. Ваш Толкователь с шипением оживает, переводя слова:{/n} "Взгляни, падаль... неужто это т{mf|от|а} мон-кай, что стоил{mf||а} тебе твоего места подле архонта?"

{n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий друкари, чье тело испещрено болезненного вида проколами и усеяно металлическими кольцами и зажимами, издает смешок при вашем приближении и заговаривает на своем языке. Ваш Толкователь с шипением оживает, переводя слова:{/n} "Взгляни, падаль... неужто это т{mf|от|а} мон-кай, что стоил{mf||а} тебе твоего места подле архонта?"

Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}这个身材高大的黑暗灵族浑身上下覆满了看起来非常疼痛的穿刺伤口，刺着各种各样的金属环与金属钉。当你接近时，他咯咯笑了起来，以黑暗灵族的语言开了口。你的阐释器发出了嘶嘶的声音，翻译着他的话。{/n}“看啊，腐肉……莫非就是这只猴子，让你失去了执政官的地位吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个身材高大的黑暗灵族浑身上下覆满了看起来非常疼痛的穿刺伤口，刺着各种各样的金属环与金属钉。当你接近时，他咯咯笑了起来，以黑暗灵族的语言开了口。你的阐释器发出了嘶嘶的声音，翻译着他的话。{/n}“看啊，腐肉……莫非就是这只猴子，让你失去了执政官的地位吗？”
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari, dont le corps est bardé de plaies, d'anneaux et pinces de métal, laisse échapper un ricanement à votre approche et se met à parler dans sa propre langue. Immédiatement, votre élucidateur émet un sifflement et traduit :{/n} « Regarde, vieille charogne... Ce ne serait pas {mf|le|la} mon-keigh qui t'a coûté ta place aux côtés de l'archonte ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari, dont le corps est bardé de plaies, d'anneaux et pinces de métal, laisse échapper un ricanement à votre approche et se met à parler dans sa propre langue. Immédiatement, votre élucidateur émet un sifflement et traduit :{/n} « Regarde, vieille charogne... Ce ne serait pas {mf|le|la} mon-keigh qui t'a coûté ta place aux côtés de l'archonte ? »
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}El alto Drukhari, cuyo cuerpo está cubierto de punciones dolorosas y adornado con anillas y sujeciones de metal, suelta una risa al verte y habla en su idioma. Tu Dilucidador cobra vida, traduciendo lo que dice:{/n} «Mira, carroña... ¿No es est{mf|e|a} {mf|el|la} mon-keigh que te costó tu puesto junto a la Arconte?».
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El alto Drukhari, cuyo cuerpo está cubierto de punciones dolorosas y adornado con anillas y sujeciones de metal, suelta una risa al verte y habla en su idioma. Tu Dilucidador cobra vida, traduciendo lo que dice:{/n} «Mira, carroña... ¿No es est{mf|e|a} {mf|el|la} mon-keigh que te costó tu puesto junto a la Arconte?».
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくと、痛ましい刺し傷まみれで金属製のリングや留め金のついた背の高いデュカーリが、含み笑いをしてから自分たちの言葉で話をする。エルシデイターが甲高い音を立て、その言葉を翻訳した。{/n}「見ろ、腐肉よ…これがアーコンのお前の立場を奪ったモン＝ケイか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくと、痛ましい刺し傷まみれで金属製のリングや留め金のついた背の高いデュカーリが、含み笑いをしてから自分たちの言葉で話をする。エルシデイターが甲高い音を立て、その言葉を翻訳した。{/n}「見ろ、腐肉よ…これがアーコンのお前の立場を奪ったモン＝ケイか？」
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, lacht der große Drukhari, dessen Körper mit schmerzhaft aussehenden Stichwunden übersät und mit unzähligen Metallringen und -klammern verziert ist. Er beginnt, in seiner eigenen Sprache zu sprechen. Dein Elucidator erwacht zischend zum Leben und übersetzt:{/n} "Seht, Aas ... ist das der Chem-Pan-Sey, der Euch Euren Platz an der Seite der Archontin gekostet hat?"
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, lacht der große Drukhari, dessen Körper mit schmerzhaft aussehenden Stichwunden übersät und mit unzähligen Metallringen und -klammern verziert ist. Er beginnt, in seiner eigenen Sprache zu sprechen. Dein Elucidator erwacht zischend zum Leben und übersetzt:{/n} "Seht, Aas ... ist das der Chem-Pan-Sey, der Euch Euren Platz an der Seite der Archontin gekostet hat?"
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu Drukhari'nin vücudu, acıtıyormuş gibi duran deliklerle, metal halkalarla ve klipslerle kaplanmış. Sen yaklaşırken gülüp kendi dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor. Cızırdayarak çalışmaya başlayan Aydınlatıcı, Drukhari'nin dediklerini tercüme ediyor.{/n} "Baksana leş kılıklı... Şu, Arkon'un gözünden düşmene sebep olan mon-keigh değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Drukhari, whose body is riddled with painful-looking puncture wounds and dotted with metal rings and clamps, lets out a chuckle as you approach and begins speaking in his own language. Your Elucidator hisses to life, translating the words:{/n} "Look, carrion... is this the mon-keigh that cost you your place at the Archon's side?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzun boylu Drukharinin vücudu, acıtıyormuş gibi duran deliklerle yaralanmış ve de metal halkalar ve klipslerle kaplanmış. Sen yaklaşırken gülüp kendi dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor. Elindeki Aydınlatıcı cızırdayarak çalışmaya başlayarak Drukharinin dediklerini tercüme ediyor.{/n} "Baksana leş kılıklı... Arkon'un gözünden düşmene sebep olan mon-keigh şu değil mi?"
traits.speaker: Abess
